bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Alternative Names jiao jian 脚趼 , callous legs.

Pathological Condition brought forth by excessive friction with the skin of the feet being injured, hardened, developing blisters, and giving a feeling when walking as ifstepped on a foreign body, accompanied by pain. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry ban xia 半夏 quoting Bin hu ji jian fang 瀕湖集簡方 : 遠行足趼，方同上 , “For callous feet after a long walk, the recipe is identical with thenamed above”.
